Description: Marketing Automation made easy with Force24
Name: Force24 v2

Methods.Name: List Changed Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts who have been recently changed or newly added.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Returns details of a specified contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Get contact details by their email address.

Methods.Name: Create Or Update Contact
Methods.Description: Allows partial create/update on a batch of records based on Force24 Id, EmailAddress or ExternalId.

Methods.Name: List Deleted Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts who have been recently deleted.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a specified contact.

Methods.Name: Get Recent Marketing Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of client contacts that were recently added to the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Add Contact To Marketing List
Methods.Description: Add a contact to the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Remove Contact From Marketing List
Methods.Description: Remove a contact from the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Get Removed Marketing Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of client contacts that were recently removed from the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Bulk Add Contacts To Marketing List
Methods.Description: Add a list of contacts to the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Bulk Remove Contacts From Marketing List
Methods.Description: Remove a list of contacts from the specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: List Marketing Lists
Methods.Description: Returns all client marketing lists.

Methods.Name: Delete Marketing List
Methods.Description: Delete a specified marketing list.

Methods.Name: Create Marketing List
Methods.Description: Create a new marketing list.

Methods.Name: Get Marketing List
Methods.Description: Returns details for a specific marketing list.

Methods.Name: List Object Fields
Methods.Description: List the fields for the specified objectId. Passing a non-existant Object ID will return an empty array.

Methods.Name: List Account Objects
Methods.Description: List the available account objects.

Methods.Name: List Sent Items
Methods.Description: Lists email sent items.

Methods.Name: Get Email Campaign
Methods.Description: Returns details of a specified email campaign.

Methods.Name: List Email Opens
Methods.Description: List email opens.

Methods.Name: List Email Clicks
Methods.Description: List email clicks.

Methods.Name: List Email Unsubscribes
Methods.Description: List email unsubscribes.

Methods.Name: List Email Bounces
Methods.Description: List email bounces.

Methods.Name: List Subscription Preferences
Methods.Description: Returns a list of client subscription preferences.
